name: combat

C2 [ C or U ] a fight, especially during a war: There was fierce combat between the two sides. No one knew how many troops had died in combat. The soldiers were engaged in hand-to-hand combat. armed combat (= fighting with weapons) unarmed combat (= fighting without weapons)
[ C ] a fight between two people or things: The film explores the combat between good and evil.
